sub_topic: Determining the bond enthalpy of a molecule
message_1: What is the bond enthalpy of a chlorine molecule (Cl2), given that the bond dissociation energy of one chlorine-chlorine bond is 242 kJ/mol?
message_2: The bond enthalpy of a chlorine molecule (Cl2) is equal to the bond dissociation energy of one chlorine-chlorine bond. Since the bond dissociation energy of one Cl-Cl bond is given as 242 kJ/mol, the bond enthalpy of a chlorine molecule (Cl2) is also 242 kJ/mol.
